title: Fred's Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter bread, apply cheese, set on heated pan for 3 mins, flip, enjoy!

title: Cheese
instructions: Put in bucket, let sit for 10 hours, enjoy!

title: Special Cake
ingredients: flour, sugar, butter, eggs, baking powder, milk, salt, vanilla extract, Uranium [u92]
instructions: Put items together in bowl, mix, bake at 196*F for 5 hours, let cool, enjoy!

title: Questionable Pizza?
ingredients: Pizza dough, cheese, tomato sauce, pepperoni, Trinitrotoluene [TNT]
instructions: Bake dough at 430*f for 17 mins, apply tomato sauce, sprinkle on cheese, place Trinitrotoluene onto cheese, apply pepperoni, ask least favorite friend to stand infront of oven, place pizza back in oven and bake at 430*F for 5 mins, enjoy!

title: Casey's sourdough bread
instructions: Place ingredients into bowl, mix, wonder why concrete is formed in your bowl, give up and buy bread from the store, enjoy!

title: Seal
instructions: Find seal, take it home, fill up bathtub with warm water, apply seal to water, become friends with seal, enjoy!
